chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 mini has the above problem:

Quality issues:
The casing has a strong cut at the top of the building (Image 1 IMG_2313) and several scuffs at the bottom (Image 2 IMG_2314) that do not meet the quality criteria 'excellent'.
Expected micro-damage according to the quality criteria 'excellent' as compared in Image 3 (IMG_2312)

Please clarify regarding the two noted non-micro-scratches.

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded €60 to the customer for wrong grade.

Kind regards, 
Antonio from Back Market
